comments: Her answers are not helpful AT ALL! I have wondered many times if she actually reads what you send her. Whether it be assignments, papers, or emails, her comments are completely off-topic, contradictory, and don\'t answer any of your questions. She is hopelessly unclear about what she would like to see in your work.
Grades very slow, would only leave one day to complete a final draft because it takes her so long to grade the first draft.

She is a very bad teacher. She dosen\'t communicate well at all, she will say call her back at a certin time and then I would call her back she would say call back at a different time. It was a never ending cycle.
She is slow at grading, assignments were due on Saturday and my grade for the draft would\'t be posted untill Thursday. She is bad at following through with what she says she is going to do.
Lots of meaningless assignments that took time away from developing essays- not instructors fault tho. She is slow on grading.

I\'m good at english, so this class wasn\'t hard. However, she is always running late grading assignments and the grades are never posted when she says they will be. She was almost 4 weeks behind! You won\'t have time to use to online tutor because she will give you your assignment on late mon. & its due sat. Will never take again!!
did have mutliple computer/other problems, therefore never returned an assignment in a reasonable timely fashion.

VERY slow grading assignments which is fusterating because you can not complete the next assignment until she has graded the first assignment and posted her comments. Always has "problems" with her computer. Does use a virtual tutor which could help in developing essays.
